title: Resident social lounge, Controlled-entry access, Onsite playground
posting_body: South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.

With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.

Oversized walk-in closets-Exterior storage available-Stainless steel appliances including refrigerator and dishwasher                                                                                                                                Select units                                                                                                                                Featured amenity-Ceiling fans in dining room-Wood-style plank flooring-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity-Separate dining area-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity-Polished kitchen countertops-Subway tile kitchen backsplash

Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance-Resident social lounge-Professional onsite management-Barbecue pavilions and picnic area-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)-Convenient access to public transportation-Controlled-entry access-Complimentary Wi-Fi in common areas-Package locker with 24/7 access to packages
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
